hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.CREATOR, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.CREATE_TIME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.MODIFIER, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.MODIFY_TIME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.REC_VER, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.REC_STATUS, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.ORG_ID, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.EOCP_ID, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.EOCP_EOGP_PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.EOCP_NAME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.TIME_ZONE from EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY where 1=1 << and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.EOCP_EOGP_PM_CODE = :eocpEogpPmCode >> << and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.ORG_ID = :orgId>> order by EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY.EOCP_NAME desc
